_source: speak;Emberson;I should've known you'd betray us, but somehow I'm still surprised.|You and your bleeding heart.;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Brassfield;Save it, Wilfrith.{w} Unlike you, I cannot stomach this slaughter.;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Emberson;Yes, I've noticed.{w} You never did have the guts for this work.{w}{clear}Suppose you've come to me to die, then, is that it?;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Emberson;Hah!{w} Still got some fire in you!|Let's see how long you've got until the last of it sputters out!;center;;boss_convo_left
